name: GMooh
description:
GMooh started as a measure of my skills in game development at the time.

The name is a sort of wordplay between the japanese sound 'Jiiii' (staring intently at someone) and 'Get me out of here'. These two things combined created GMooh (pronounced Jiii-Muuu), a big blob man who's always lived in darkness and is now trying to escape it!

Currently there are no plans to update or finish the game, although this might change if there is a demand for it.

Hope you enjoy!

PS: This game was initially targeted towards mobile gamers. Let me know if you want the apk!
